focus: Deep Risk Scenario Modeling - Undiscovered Risks
methodology: Online research of actual failures, post-mortems, and production incidents

zvents_shutdown.cause: Mobile-first transition lag + competition + limited engagement
zvents_shutdown.revenue_model: Failed due to declining revenue and rising costs
zvents_shutdown.key_lesson: Publisher-based event discovery became obsolete with mobile-first behavior
zvents_shutdown.relevance: HIGH - What's Poppin must avoid same mobile optimization delays

eventvue_shutdown.cause: No product-market fit testing before launch
eventvue_shutdown.key_lesson: Assumptions about usefulness not validated with customers
eventvue_shutdown.relevance: CRITICAL - Validates need for 100 user interviews pre-launch

bandsintown_success.key_lesson: Niche focus (concerts only) allowed market dominance
bandsintown_success.relevance: MEDIUM - Suggests niche-down strategy over broad platform

wriggle_restaurant_discovery.key_lesson: Event-dependent businesses extremely vulnerable to black swan events
wriggle_restaurant_discovery.relevance: CRITICAL - COVID-like event could destroy business overnight

meetro_social_network.cause: Geographic fragmentation - success in Chicago didn't transfer to other cities
meetro_social_network.key_lesson: Network effects don't cross city boundaries in location apps
meetro_social_network.relevance: CRITICAL - Validates single-city launch, but warns expansion is difficult

color_labs_photo_sharing.cause: Confusing interface + proximity-based feature users didn't want
color_labs_photo_sharing.acquisition: Acquired by Apple for talent only
color_labs_photo_sharing.key_lesson: Massive funding doesn't prevent UX disasters
color_labs_photo_sharing.relevance: HIGH - User testing absolutely essential before launch

cold_start_problem.failure_rate: Most marketplaces never get past cold start stage
cold_start_problem.network_density: 1M users with 2 connections < 100K users with 30 connections
cold_start_problem.key_lesson: Density beats total user count - focus on single market first
cold_start_problem.big_launch_danger: Techcrunch launches pump total users but don't help density
cold_start_problem.relevance: CRITICAL - Confirms 500-event pre-seed strategy is correct

retention_benchmarks_2024.one_time_use: 25% of users never return after first session
retention_benchmarks_2024.platform_gap: iOS retention higher than Android, Android declining YoY
retention_benchmarks_2024.key_lesson: Industry retention is WORSE than previous estimates (2.8% was optimistic)
retention_benchmarks_2024.relevance: CRITICAL - 15% target is 2.5x harder than initially projected

postgresql_geospatial_production.50m_row_updates: 24+ hours for spatial updates on 50M row table
postgresql_geospatial_production.12m_record_scans: 3 seconds without optimization, unusable for production
postgresql_geospatial_production.performance_degradation: Gets slower over time without regular VACUUM
postgresql_geospatial_production.configuration_default: PostgreSQL defaults are woefully inadequate for production
postgresql_geospatial_production.shared_buffers_recommendation: 25% of system RAM for dedicated servers
postgresql_geospatial_production.key_lesson: Even with proper indexing, large-scale spatial operations are SLOW
postgresql_geospatial_production.relevance: CRITICAL - Need migration plan BEFORE hitting 10M+ venues

react_native_performance.dev_vs_release: JavaScript thread performance MUCH worse in dev mode
react_native_performance.ui_fps_vs_js_fps: Both must be ~60fps, not just one
react_native_performance.context_api_problem: Inefficient Context API causes excessive rendering
react_native_performance.key_lesson: Always test performance in RELEASE builds, not development
react_native_performance.relevance: HIGH - Current testing plan may miss production issues

meilisearch_scale_limits.116m_documents: Failed to load in 2 days, only 38% completed
meilisearch_scale_limits.horizontal_scaling: NO horizontal scaling support - single machine only
meilisearch_scale_limits.lmdb_limitations: LMDB doesn't work on network file systems (AWS EFS)
meilisearch_scale_limits.disk_space_rule: Need 10x dataset size in disk space
meilisearch_scale_limits.key_lesson: Meilisearch has HARD limits around 50-100M documents
meilisearch_scale_limits.relevance: CRITICAL - Need migration plan when approaching 10M venues

stripe_disputes_edge_cases.dispute_timeline: 2-3 months full lifecycle, issuer has 60-75 days
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.dispute_window_events: Starts on EVENT DATE, not payment date (huge risk)
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.pre_dispute_conversion: 80% of early fraud warnings turn into chargebacks if ignored
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.multiple_disputes: Single payment can have multiple disputes
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.non_refundable_fees: Dispute fee non-refundable even if you win
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.visa_compliance_fee: $500 fee for compliance disputes (refunded if won)
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.monitoring_program_risk: Failure to comply can result in losing ALL card processing
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.key_lesson: Event ticketing has MUCH longer dispute windows than regular purchases
stripe_disputes_edge_cases.relevance: CRITICAL - 6+ month dispute window for future events

gdpr_enforcement_startups.startup_targeting: Startups increasingly targeted, especially facial recognition and adtech
gdpr_enforcement_startups.key_lesson: GDPR fines are existential threats to startups, not just big tech
gdpr_enforcement_startups.relevance: CRITICAL - Location tracking makes What's Poppin high-risk target

content_moderation_liability.section_230_protection: U.S. only - doesn't apply in EU or other jurisdictions
content_moderation_liability.40_new_laws: 40 new social media laws worldwide in last 2 years
content_moderation_liability.platform_migration: Dangerous users migrate when platforms tighten policies
content_moderation_liability.non_judicial_takedowns: Some jurisdictions require quick takedowns by non-judicial authorities
content_moderation_liability.liability_expansion: Companies and STAFF face expanded personal liability
content_moderation_liability.key_lesson: Content moderation requirements getting STRICTER, not looser
content_moderation_liability.relevance: HIGH - Event platform could be liable for dangerous/illegal events

gcp_billing_disasters.budget_limitations: Setting budget does NOT cap resource consumption
gcp_billing_disasters.billing_delay: Costs can appear 24+ hours later (not real-time)
gcp_billing_disasters.leaked_credentials: Crypto miners can rack up massive bills in hours
gcp_billing_disasters.key_lesson: Budget alerts are theater - they don't prevent overruns
gcp_billing_disasters.relevance: CRITICAL - Need HARD infrastructure caps, not just alerts

supabase_realtime_production.horizontal_scaling_broken: Presence counts out of sync across multiple servers
supabase_realtime_production.quota_enforcement: Hard quotas cause errors when exceeded, no graceful degradation
supabase_realtime_production.2_week_notice: High load events require 2 weeks advance notice to Supabase
supabase_realtime_production.production_launch_risk: Production launches can fail if not pre-coordinated
supabase_realtime_production.september_instability: Recent production instability detected and fixed
supabase_realtime_production.key_lesson: Supabase Realtime NOT production-ready without Enterprise support
supabase_realtime_production.relevance: HIGH - Free tier 50K MAU limit could be hit in first month

app_store_rejections.location_battery_concern: Background GPS usage primary rejection reason for location apps
app_store_rejections.geofencing_requirement: Apple recommends geofencing over continuous tracking
app_store_rejections.copycat_apps: Rejected if too similar to existing apps
app_store_rejections.key_lesson: Location apps face extra scrutiny on battery usage and privacy
app_store_rejections.relevance: HIGH - Background location feature could block App Store approval

event_ticketing_fraud.social_media_losses: $1.2B consumer losses in 2022 from social media scams
event_ticketing_fraud.fraud_doubling: Ticket fraud reports doubled since start of 2022
event_ticketing_fraud.concert_fraud_rate: 12% of concert ticket buyers fall victim to scams
event_ticketing_fraud.stolen_card_pattern: Buy tickets with stolen cards, immediately resell to unsuspecting buyers
event_ticketing_fraud.eventbrite_phishing: Fake events used to phish users with realistic emails
event_ticketing_fraud.key_lesson: Event platforms are HIGH-VALUE fraud targets
event_ticketing_fraud.relevance: CRITICAL - Fraud prevention must be stronger than initially planned

marketplace_commission_failures.disintermediation: High commissions drive users to transact off-platform
marketplace_commission_failures.competitive_bidding: Competitors outbid each other until no one makes money
marketplace_commission_failures.seller_pushback: eBay faced backlash from high fees, sellers left platform
marketplace_commission_failures.initial_low_revenue: Commission models generate low revenue early stage
marketplace_commission_failures.pricing_too_low: Unsustainable low rates lead to marketplace failure
marketplace_commission_failures.structural_monopoly_need: Markets not set up for monopoly/duopoly will erode margins and kill business
marketplace_commission_failures.key_lesson: Commission rates are goldilocks problem - too high or too low both fail
marketplace_commission_failures.relevance: CRITICAL - 2.9% ticketing fee may be too low to be sustainable

execution_risks: Team capability gaps preventing technical execution
Timeline slippage causing missed market windows
Technical debt accumulation making pivots impossible
Founder burnout from 18-24 month grind to profitability
Key person dependency (single developer knows critical systems)
market_timing_risks: Economic recession reducing discretionary event spending
Pandemic 2.0 or similar black swan destroying event industry
Competitor launches first and achieves market dominance
User behavior shifts away from in-person events permanently
Generational preferences change (Gen Z abandons discovery apps)
product_complexity_risks: Feature scope creep destroying simple UX
Technical complexity making bug fixes take weeks not days
Performance degradation that can't be fixed without rewrite
UX confusion requiring complete redesign after launch
platform_dependency_risks: Stripe changes terms or suspends account
Yelp API access revoked or rate limits reduced
GCP changes pricing model or terms
legal_regulatory_risks: New local laws requiring event organizer licensing
GDPR enforcement action despite best efforts
Lawsuit from injury at listed event
Tax nexus issues in multiple states/countries
financial_sustainability_risks: Burn rate acceleration from unplanned expenses
Revenue shortfall from lower conversion than projected
Funding gap - unable to raise Series A
Runway miscalculation - run out of money before break-even
operational_failure_risks: Third-party API sunset with no migration path
reputational_damage_risks: High-profile event disaster associated with platform

newly_discovered_gaps: Geographic expansion impossibility (network effects don't cross cities)
GCP billing disasters (budget alerts don't prevent overruns)
App Store rejection risk for background location
Event ticketing fraud epidemic (12% of buyers)
Stripe dispute timeline for future events (6+ months)
React Native dev vs release performance gap

business_model_threats: Meilisearch scale limits forcing expensive migration
Network effects not crossing city boundaries
Retention worse than projected (6% vs 15% target)
